main event: A bright light was seen in the sky over Santa Monica Beach, California, which split into two objects.
interesting points: The object was observed both visually and on radar for 29 seconds.
The object appeared to be blinking with red and white lights, and was estimated to be at an altitude of around 1,000 feet.
There was uncertainty about the nature of the object, with possible explanations including a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon.
The report indicates that no aircraft were observed heading northward in the area at the time of the sighting.
The sighting occurred at around 3:00 AM local time (7:00 AM UTC).
sighted object: a bright light in the sky that split into two objects
